title: [娱乐]Seb's Patch Voting Plugin —— 在游戏内发起一个投票吧！[1.12]
author: 小鱼123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小鱼123 于 2018-2-11 16:29 编辑 


Introduction介绍
Seb's Patch Voting is a plugin that allows a user to easily create an ingame voting menu.
塞布的投票补丁是一个允许玩家轻松创建一个游戏内投票菜单的插件。
It was created for a plugin request on the Bukkit forums.
它是为Bukkit论坛上的插件请求而创建的。


Usage用法首先，发起者必须设置几个投票选项。然后，在他为其他玩家打开投票菜单后，玩家可以点击他们想要投票的选项。玩家可以最多选择三个选项，并且当玩家把鼠标悬停在选项上时，可以显示在一个项目上所投有的票数。First a moderator has to setup several voting options. Then, after he has opened the voting menu for other players, players can click on options they want to vote on.
A player can vote for up to three options right now and the number of votes that have been placed on an item are displayed when you hover the mouse over the option.



Command命令
/pvote    展示投票菜单/pvote add <option name>    添加一个选项. 这会打开一个你能够选择选项图标的菜单./pvote remove    移除一个选项. 这会打开一个你能够选择移除选项的菜单./pvote open    允许玩家投票/pvote close    禁止玩家投票



Permissions权限
Seb's Patch Voting Plugin has two permissions. One allows players to vote and the other will allow players to add and remove options from the voting screen.

pvote.basic    Allows players to access the voting screen
pvote.admin    Allows players to use the add/remove/open/close commands.

replies.txt_content: eng。。  有时间限制的功能嘛。
